verses.verse: וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <WH6213> Moreover he made מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> an altar נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <WH753> the length וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> thereof and twenty אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits רָחְבּ֑וֹ <WH7341> the breadth וְעֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> thereof and ten אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> the height ס

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> Also he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> sea מוּצָ֑ק <WH3332> a molten עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> of ten בָּֽ֠אַמָּה <WH520> cubits מִשְּׂפָת֨וֹ <WH8193> from brim אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׂפָת֜וֹ <WH8193> to brim עָג֣וֹל ׀ <WH5696> round סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> in compass וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits קֽוֹמָת֔וֹ <WH6967> the height וְקָו֙ <WH6957> thereof and a line שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> of thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits יָסֹ֥ב <WH5437> did compass אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> it round about

וּדְמ֣וּת <WH1823> And under it [was] the similitude בְּקָרִים֩ <WH1241> of oxen תַּ֨חַת <WH8478> under ל֜וֹ סָבִ֤יב ׀ <WH5439> it round about סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> round about סוֹבְבִ֣ים <WH5437> which did compass אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> עֶ֚שֶׂר <WH6235> ten בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> in a cubit מַקִּיפִ֥ים <WH5362> compassing אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> the sea סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> it all שְׁנַ֤יִם <WH8147> Two טוּרִים֙ <WH2905> rows הַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> of oxen יְצוּקִ֖ים <WH3332> [were] cast בְּמֻֽצַקְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4166> when it was cast

עוֹמֵ֞ד <WH5975> It stood עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׁנֵ֧ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten בָּקָ֗ר <WH1241> oxen שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three פֹנִ֣ים ׀ <WH6437> looking צָפ֡וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north וּשְׁלוֹשָׁה֩ <WH7969> and three פֹנִ֨ים ׀ <WH6437> looking יָ֜מָּה <WH3220> toward the west וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה ׀ <WH7969> and three פֹּנִ֣ים <WH6437> looking נֶ֗גְבָּה <WH5045> toward the south וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> and three פֹּנִ֣ים <WH6437> looking מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> toward the east וְהַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> and the sea עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> on מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> [was set] above וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲחֹרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH268> upon them and all their hinder parts בָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> [were] inward

וְעָבְי֣וֹ <WH5672> And the thickness טֶ֔פַח <WH2947> of it [was] an handbreadth וּשְׂפָתוֹ֙ <WH8193> and the brim כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> of it like the work שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> of the brim כּ֔וֹס <WH3563> of a cup פֶּ֖רַח <WH6525> with flowers שֽׁוֹשַׁנָּ֑ה <WH7799> of lilies מַחֲזִ֣יק <WH2388> [and] it received בַּתִּ֔ים <WH1324> baths שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> three אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand יָכִֽיל׃ <WH3557> and held ס

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> He made כִּיּוֹרִים֮ <WH3595> lavers עֲשָׂרָה֒ <WH6235> also ten וַ֠יִּתֵּן <WH5414> and put חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> five מִיָּמִ֜ין <WH3225> on the right hand וַחֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> and five מִשְּׂמֹאול֙ <WH8040> on the left לְרָחְצָ֣ה <WH7364> to wash בָהֶ֔ם אֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> in them such things as they offered הָעוֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> for the burnt offering יָדִ֣יחוּ <WH1740> they washed בָ֑ם וְהַיָּ֕ם <WH3220> in them but the sea לְרָחְצָ֥ה <WH7364> to wash in לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> [was] for the priests בּֽוֹ׃ ס

וַ֠יַּעַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> מְנֹר֧וֹת <WH4501> candlesticks הַזָּהָ֛ב <WH2091> of gold עֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> ten כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑ם <WH4941> according to their form וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and set בַּֽהֵיכָ֔ל <WH1964> [them] in the temple חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> five מִיָּמִ֖ין <WH3225> on the right hand וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מִשְּׂמֹֽאול׃ <WH8040> on the left ס

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> He made שֻׁלְחָנוֹת֮ <WH7979> tables עֲשָׂרָה֒ <WH6235> also ten וַיַּנַּח֙ <WH3240> and placed בַּֽהֵיכָ֔ל <WH1964> [them] in the temple חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> five מִיָּמִ֖ין <WH3225> on the right side וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> and five מִשְּׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> on the left וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made מִזְרְקֵ֥י <WH4219> basons זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold מֵאָֽה׃ <WH3967> an hundred

וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <WH6213> Furthermore he made חֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> the court הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests וְהָעֲזָרָ֖ה <WH5835> court הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> and the great וּדְלָת֧וֹת <WH1817> and doors לָעֲזָרָ֛ה <WH5835> for the court וְדַלְתוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1817> the doors צִפָּ֥ה <WH6823> and overlaid נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> of them with brass

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֗ם <WH3220> the sea נָתַ֞ן <WH5414> And he set מִכֶּ֧תֶף <WH3802> side הַיְמָנִ֛ית <WH3233> on the right קֵ֖דְמָה <WH6924> of the east end מִמּ֥וּל <WH4136> over against נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> the south

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> made חוּרָ֔ם <WH2361> And Huram אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֨סִּיר֔וֹת <WH5518> the pots וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּעִ֖ים <WH3257> and the shovels וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְרָק֑וֹת <WH4219> and the basons ס וַיְכַ֣ל <WH3615> finished [חיּרָם כ] (חוּרָ֗ם <WH2438> Hiram ק) לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> that he was to make אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> the work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> performed לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> for king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> for the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

עַמּוּדִ֣ים <WH5982> pillars שְׁנַ֔יִם <WH8147> [To wit] the two וְהַגֻּלּ֧וֹת <WH1543> and the pommels וְהַכֹּתָר֛וֹת <WH3805> and the chapiters עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> [which were] on the top הָעַמּוּדִ֖ים <WH5982> of the two pillars שְׁתָּ֑יִם <WH8147> and the two וְהַשְּׂבָכ֣וֹת <WH7639> wreaths שְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH8147> the two לְכַסּ֗וֹת <WH3680> to cover אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> the two גֻּלּ֣וֹת <WH1543> pommels הַכֹּֽתָר֔וֹת <WH3805> of the chapiters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> were on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> which [were] on the top הָֽעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <WH5982> of the pillars

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽרִמּוֹנִ֛ים <WH7416> pomegranates אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> And four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> on the two הַשְּׂבָכ֑וֹת <WH7639> wreaths שְׁנַ֨יִם <WH8147> two טוּרִ֤ים <WH2905> rows רִמּוֹנִים֙ <WH7416> of pomegranates לַשְּׂבָכָ֣ה <WH7639> wreath הָאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> on each לְכַסּ֗וֹת <WH3680> to cover אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> the two גֻּלּ֣וֹת <WH1543> pommels הַכֹּֽתָר֔וֹת <WH3805> of the chapiters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> upon פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> which [were] upon הָעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <WH5982> the pillars

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּכֹנ֖וֹת <WH4350> also bases עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> He made וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּיֹּר֥וֹת <WH3595> and lavers עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> made עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמְּכֹנֽוֹת׃ <WH4350> he upon the bases
אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> sea אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> One וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּקָ֥ר <WH1241> oxen שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> under

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֠סִּירוֹת <WH5518> The pots וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּעִ֤ים <WH3257> also and the shovels וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְלָגוֹת֙ <WH4207> and the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כְּלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3627> and all their instruments עָשָׂ֞ה <WH6213> make חוּרָ֥ם <WH2361> did Huram אָבִ֛יו <WH1> his father לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> to king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> for the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> brass מָרֽוּק׃ <WH4838> of bright

בְּכִכַּ֤ר <WH3603> In the plain הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> of Jordan יְצָקָ֣ם <WH3332> cast הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> did the king בַּעֲבִ֖י <WH5645> them in the clay הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> ground בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between סֻכּ֖וֹת <WH5523> between Succoth וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between צְרֵדָֽתָה׃ <WH6868> and Zeredathah

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> made שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> Thus Solomon כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֵּלִ֥ים <WH3627> all these vessels הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לָרֹ֣ב <WH7230> abundance מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> in great כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> could נֶחְקַ֖ר <WH2713> could not be found out מִשְׁקַ֥ל <WH4948> for the weight הַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> of the brass פ

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> made שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> And Solomon אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> all the vessels אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> were בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> that [were for] the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> altar הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> the golden וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָנ֔וֹת <WH7979> also and the tables וַעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> with לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> the bread הַפָּנִֽים׃ <WH6440> of the Presence

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנֹר֞וֹת <WH4501> Moreover the candlesticks וְנֵרֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5216> with their lamps לְבַעֲרָ֧ם <WH1197> that they should burn כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֛ט <WH4941> after the manner לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַדְּבִ֖יר <WH1687> the oracle זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold סָגֽוּר׃ <WH5462> of pure

וְהַפֶּ֧רַח <WH6525> And the flowers וְהַנֵּר֛וֹת <WH5216> and the lamps וְהַמֶּלְקַחַ֖יִם <WH4457> and the tongs זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> [made he of] gold ה֖וּא <WH1931> he מִכְל֥וֹת <WH4357> [and] that perfect זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> gold

וְהַֽמְזַמְּר֧וֹת <WH4212> And the snuffers וְהַמִּזְרָק֛וֹת <WH4219> and the basons וְהַכַּפּ֥וֹת <WH3709> and the spoons וְהַמַּחְתּ֖וֹת <WH4289> and the censers זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold סָג֑וּר <WH5462> [of] pure וּפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> and the entry הַ֠בַּיִת <WH1004> of the house דַּלְתוֹתָ֨יו <WH1817> doors הַפְּנִימִיּ֜וֹת <WH6442> the inner לְקֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> thereof for the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֗ים <WH6944> holy וְדַלְתֵ֥י <WH1817> [place] and the doors הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> of the house לַהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> of the temple זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> [were of] gold
